mapper.select:
select a.id as "id", a.track_id as "trackId", a.car_id as "carId", a.start_time as "startTime", a.end_time as "endTime", a.miles as "miles" from track a where 1=1
and a.track_id = #{trackId}
mapper.insert: insert into track( id, track_id, car_id, start_time, end_time, miles ) values ( #{id}, #{trackId}, #{carId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{miles} )
mapper.update: update track set track_id = #{trackId}, car_id = #{carId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, miles = #{miles} where id = #{id}
